echo-category-title-bs-social-entity-cat: Checkbox label for mail and wiki notification subscription for actions on entities on page user watches
bs-social-notifications-entity-create: Short message when new entity is created. $1 - Entity type
bs-social-notifications-email-entity-cre: Email subject when new entity is created. $1 - Entity type
Email body message when new entity is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Entity type
Email body message when new entity is created for entities of type Text. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Entity type, $4 - Text of the entity
bs-social-notifications-web-entity-creat: Web body message when new entity is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Entity type
bs-social-notifications-entity-edit: Short message when entity is edited. $1 - Entity type
bs-social-notifications-email-entity-edi: Email subject when entity is edited. $1 - Entity type
Email body message when entity is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Entity type
Email body message when entity is edited for entities of type Text. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Entity type, $4 - Text of the entity
bs-social-notifications-web-entity-edit-: Web body message when entity is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Entity type
bs-social-notifications-entity-delete: Short message when entity is deleted. $1 - Entity type
bs-social-notifications-email-entity-del: Email subject when entity is deleted. $1 - Entity type
Email body message when entity is deleted. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Entity type
bs-social-notifications-web-entity-delet: Email body message when entity is deleted. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Entity type
